name: data-card-09
effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first in the Pokéathlon Disc Catch.
short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in first in the Pokéathlon Disc Catch.

flavor_text.sun_moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many times you won the Pokéathlon’s Disc Catch.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many times you won the Pokéathlon’s Disc Catch.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many times you won the Pokéathlon’s Disc Catch.
